data.title: 5 Favourite Italian Handbag Brands
data.meta_description: If you're going to Milan Fashion Week, it's only right to rock some of Italy's hottest designers. Take a look at our favourite Italian brands here...
data.text:
When in Milan, do as the Milanese do: so, when jet-setting over to this stylish metropolis for Fashion Week, it seems only fitting to make sure you’re wearing some pieces from Italy’s hottest designers…

If you’re looking to add some Italian flair into your street style for Milan Fashion Week, MyBag has the answer. Take a peek below at some of our favourite Italian designers that deserve to be showcased at MFW…

Pinko

Formed in the 1980s by husband and wife duo, Pietro Negra and Cristina Rubini, Pinko is known for its statement yet feminine styles. Later joined by their two daughters, Pinko is a true Italian family affair, merging classic Italian craftsmanship with trending styles and colours that appeal to their new fashion-forward muses. Luxurious yet effortlessly wearable, Pinko adds a touch of glamour to your daily handbag and is your perfect companion to Milan fashion week.

Love Moschino

A diffusion line of the iconic Italian fashion house Moschino, Love Moschino combines classic Italian craftsmanship with trend-led fun. Unafraid of prints or embellishments, adopt the gusto and attitude of the Milanese through your accessory choice. Famous for its bold branding and uber-embellished designs, a Love Moschino is a statement piece that we're head over heels for.

Furla

It-brand of the moment, Furla has been dominating social media of late – if you’re not rocking a statement Furla bag on Instagram, are you even on-trend?

Since the Furlanetta family launched the brand in the early 1930s, Furla have been creating luxury handbags that never cease to be in high demand. With a variety of styles to choose from, our favourite shape has to be the Metropolis Mini: cute and compact, this miniature crossbody comes in all colours of the rainbow, embellished with crystals, fur, studs and more.

Fashion

The Top Five Best of British Brands at MyBag

As London Fashion Week comes round again, we’re getting patriotic with a roundup of the best of British brands here on MyBag.

4 years agoBy Sarah Atkinson

Emporio Armani

The Armani family are a big deal in fashion. The Italian luxury fashion house produces everything from haute couture to makeup to ready-to-wear and accessories, proving their prowess in the industry. Making some of the best basics in the same, we love their bags for their elegant simplicity. Easily styled, classic and beautifully crafted, you can't go wrong.

Coccinelle

Celebrating women's Gioia di Vivere, Coccinelle is an Italian brand all about putting heart into the luxury market with their lively designs. Aiming to create daily companions for women's day-to-day life, seeing them from the office to the bar, their designs merge style and practicality for a bag that is reliable and confidence-inducing.
